section.title: &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter Multiplexer (MUX) Configuration
section.para: MUX requires has three configuration files:

listitem.para: This file is specific to SAR, please refer to &JEE.PLATFORM; manual for explanation. By default this file binds &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter MUX under following JMX object name: diameter.mobicents:service=DiameterStackMultiplexer.
This file configures stack exposed by MUX, please refer to for details. It is located in mobicents-diameter-mux-&THIS.VERSION;.sar/config
